poem:
"Phantom Bounty of the Fabled Wells"

Aramco dances in the rain of paper gold, 
traded wealth coating the kingdom bold.
Driven by the liquid heart of Earth,
far from the commoners' dearth.
In this realm of arabesque and date,
dividends swirl, profits abate. 
The tumble-song echoes, lips stained with crude,
Bearing witness to fortune's fickle mood.
Yet, the desert whispers softly, in wait -
silent master of the mirth and fate.
